title: Create .env.example with all env vars
description:
Create .env.example template for local development.

## Environment Variables
```
# AI Provider
AI_PROVIDER=gemini
GEMINI_MODEL=gemini-2.5-pro
OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4-turbo
GEMINI_API_KEY=
OPENAI_API_KEY=

# BigQuery
GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT=
BQ_DATASET=
BQ_TABLE=

# Meta API
META_APP_ID=
META_APP_SECRET=
META_REDIRECT_URI=

# Observability
FI_PROJECT_NAME=agatha

# App
ENVIRONMENT=development
LOG_LEVEL=INFO
```
